title: 关于HIM的问题
author: 小游游
txt_content: 为什么HIM老是拆建筑，害的我搞的主城没了，求解决！{:10_503:}

replies.author: 龙猫精神
replies.txt_content:
= = 
不可能，你服务器有HIM Mod？

replies.author: 挽留借口
replies.txt_content: 是用了HIM mod了吧，HIM给你的苦头

replies.author: 挽留借口
replies.txt_content: 用了HIM插件的后果

replies.author: ccxz
replies.txt_content:
把LZ献给HIM享用
即可解决
